body.name: Sunglass Holder for Car Visor Clip, Magnetic Leather Eyeglass Hanger Clip for Car, Square Car Visor Accessories (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 11 mins
features: EFFORTLESS ACCESS WITH MAGNETIC DESIGN: This sunglass holder for car revolutionizes your driving experience with its unique magnetic design. Effortlessly grab or store your glasses using just one hand. The magnets provide a secure grip, ensuring your sunglass holder stays safely in place even on bumpy roads. Imagine the ease of not having to fumble for your glasses, keeping your focus on the journey ahead.

LUXURIOUS LEATHER CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from high-quality leather, this car sunglass holder is more than just a practical accessory; it's a statement of style. The elegant leather complements your car's interior, adding a touch of sophistication. It's not just about holding your glasses - it's about enhancing your car's aesthetic, making every ride a luxurious experience.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Designed with versatility in mind, this sunglass holder for car visor clip accommodates all types of glasses and sunglasses, even those with thicker frames. It ensures that your view remains unobstructed, prioritizing your safety while driving. Whether it's your sports sunglasses or fashion eyewear, this holder adapts to your needs, keeping your glasses within easy reach.

ELEVATE YOUR DRIVING CONVENIENCE: Imagine a driving experience where your eyewear is always within arm's reach, allowing you to swiftly adapt to changing light conditions. This glasses holder for car elevates your driving convenience, ensuring that your focus remains uninterrupted on the road ahead. It's not just an accessory; it's a necessity for hassle-free, enjoyable drives.

DURABLE AND DEPENDABLE: Built to withstand the rigors of daily use, this sunglass holder promises durability and reliability. Its robust construction means it's a one-time investment for long-term ease. Trust in the quality and durability of this holder to provide a secure home for your glasses, making every drive a little bit easier and a lot more stylish.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Installation steps of car sunglass holder for car Clip the car glasses holder on the sun visor. Open the magnetic flip of the sunglasses clip. Insert your sunglasses and cover it. The glasses will clip tightly to the visor without causing distractions or blocking the view, ensuring a safe and comfortable driving experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and strong clip
reviews.reviewText: Stylish clip that is strong, secure and convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: Nice and small and out of the way. Plus holds two pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Strong magnets, and it can hold both wire frames AND thick frames like Oakleys - just need to adjust the position in the clamp. They have a nice low profile, and the mat black color blends well with my sun visors. I ordered a second one for the other side, since the first worked out so nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are very cute! It doesnt fit in my car cup holders. They are about an inch too small. They do not “stick” to the cup holders. I still use them cuz I like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Handy and takes up small amount of space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was listed as fitting my car but does not.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this and even used the "will this fit my car model" listed on the page. But it does not. Anyone with one of the thicker window shades (1.5 or 2 inches or so) it will not fit on this and hold even one set of glasses well. I wish I had known this previously. Spots are two close together to fit multiple pairs and the sunglasses dont fit well if larger.Color is more of a beige than a true gray like some of the shades have. Magnets are pretty weak and it flips the opposite way your hand expects. Overall I wish I had gotten another one as this does not even fit one pair of sunglasses well. If you have a thicker sunshade be aware of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glasses stay secure even on bumpy roads
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2019 Toyota RAV4. The light gray interior matches my car's interior. My sun visor is on the thick side but the clip still works in my car. The magnets seem strong enough. My distance glasses and sunglasses stay secure even on bumpy roads. If it broke I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this eyeglass holder for my car visor because I like to keep a pair of eye glasses so that if I’m driving at night, I can easily access them. This holder is not only cute (red and leather), but it’s sturdy. Much sturdier than others that I’ve used before!!
